neg review: Terrible washing facilities hand towel to dry off after shower. When requested bath towel was told the hand towel was only available.
Room too small and sharing of toilet and bathroom
smell of cigarettes, communal toilets, cleanliness

In no way should this establishment be listed as a Hotel, it is just about the most basic worker hostel level accomodation and apears to be used solely for single male occupants many of whom would appear to be immigrants . I did not feel at all comfortable to sleep  in this establishment and promptly left to seek an alternative rest stop .

pos review: Reception available 24/7. Clean sheets and towels, comfortable bed, sink with warm water and mirror in our bedroom was very convenient, good value for money. We stayed on the third floor and our wing had two rooms only and was very quiet. Does the job for one night sleep. Good location near the highway and free parking was great!
neg review: Some toilets/showers were out of order and I imagine the guests that stayed near the toilets were always waking up with the noise flushing.
Shared and not clean bathrooms and shower
showers and toilets are outside the bedroom
